contentJson: ["Paul, a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of God’s elect, and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Paul, a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of God’s elect, and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness;

contentJson: ["In hope of eternal life, which God, that cannot lie, promised before the world began;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: In hope of eternal life, which God, that cannot lie, promised before the world began;

contentJson: ["But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching, which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching, which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour;

contentJson: ["To Titus, mine own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: To Titus, mine own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour.

contentJson: ["For this cause left I thee in Crete, that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting, and ordain elders in every city, as I had appointed thee:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: For this cause left I thee in Crete, that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting, and ordain elders in every city, as I had appointed thee:

contentJson: ["If any be blameless, the husband of one wife, having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: If any be blameless, the husband of one wife, having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly.

contentJson: ["For a bishop must be blameless, as the steward of God; not selfwilled, not soon angry, not given to wine, no striker, not given to filthy lucre;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: For a bishop must be blameless, as the steward of God; not selfwilled, not soon angry, not given to wine, no striker, not given to filthy lucre;

contentJson: ["But a lover of hospitality, a lover of good men, sober, just, holy, temperate;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: But a lover of hospitality, a lover of good men, sober, just, holy, temperate;

contentJson: ["Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught, that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught, that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers.

contentJson: ["For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers, specially they of the circumcision:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers, specially they of the circumcision:

contentJson: ["Whose mouths must be stopped, who subvert whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for filthy lucre’s sake."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Whose mouths must be stopped, who subvert whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for filthy lucre’s sake.

contentJson: ["One of themselves, even a prophet of their own, said, The Cretians are alway liars, evil beasts, slow bellies."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: One of themselves, even a prophet of their own, said, The Cretians are alway liars, evil beasts, slow bellies.

contentJson: ["This witness is true. Wherefore rebuke them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: This witness is true. Wherefore rebuke them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith;

contentJson: ["Not giving heed to Jewish fables, and commandments of men, that turn from the truth."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables, and commandments of men, that turn from the truth.

contentJson: ["Unto the pure all things are pure: but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure; but even their mind and conscience is defiled."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Unto the pure all things are pure: but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure; but even their mind and conscience is defiled.

contentJson: ["They profess that they know God; but in works they deny him, being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work reprobate."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: They profess that they know God; but in works they deny him, being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work reprobate.

contentJson: ["But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:

contentJson: ["That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.

contentJson: ["The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;

contentJson: ["That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,

contentJson: ["To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.

contentJson: ["Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.

contentJson: ["In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,

contentJson: ["Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.

contentJson: ["Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;

contentJson: ["Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.

contentJson: ["For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,

contentJson: ["Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;

contentJson: ["Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

contentJson: ["Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.

contentJson: ["These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.

contentJson: ["Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,

contentJson: ["To speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers, but gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: To speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers, but gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men.

contentJson: ["For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, and hating one another."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, and hating one another.

contentJson: ["But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,

contentJson: ["Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

contentJson: ["Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;

contentJson: ["That being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: That being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.

contentJson: ["This is a faithful saying, and these things I will that thou affirm constantly, that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: This is a faithful saying, and these things I will that thou affirm constantly, that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men.

contentJson: ["But avoid foolish questions, and genealogies, and contentions, and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: But avoid foolish questions, and genealogies, and contentions, and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.

contentJson: ["A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;"]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;

contentJson: ["Knowing that he that is such is subverted, and sinneth, being condemned of himself."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted, and sinneth, being condemned of himself.

contentJson: ["When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to winter."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to winter.

contentJson: ["Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them.

contentJson: ["And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful.

contentJson: ["All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in the faith. Grace be with you all. Amen."]
name: King James (Authorized) Version
text: All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in the faith. Grace be with you all. Amen.
